fields.summary: Android: When trying to remove the contents of a window, the window doesn't have any children

comments.body: This issue is related to TIMOB-7482

Btw, here is what does not work on Android: https://gist.github.com/2867975



For some reason, "_children" property does what "children" does in case of a window. "children" property on the other hand does nothing.

Environment used for verification -
Tested with Titanium SDK: 2.1.1.v20120716180600
Tested with Titanium Â Studio: 2.1.1.201207161421
Device - Android Emulator 2.3.3
Machine OS - MAC 10.7.3
